title: Form Validation Pattern
excerpt: Ensuring data integrity and improving user experience in forms.
content:
Form validation is a UI pattern used to check user input in a form and provide feedback on errors or successful submission. It helps ensure data integrity and improves the overall user experience by preventing errors and guiding users to correct input.

Key Principles

  • Immediate feedback
  • Clear error messages
  • Positive reinforcement
  • Accessible design

Best Practices

  1. Validate in real-time where appropriate
  2. Provide specific and helpful error messages
  3. Use color and icons to reinforce messaging
  4. Indicate both errors and successful validation
  5. Ensure form is submittable only when all required fields are valid
